      • newBook

        @RateLimiter(name="DDoS-stopper")
@PostMapping("/bookstores/{storeID}/books")
protected org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<Book>> newBook​(@RequestBody
                                                                                                         Book book,
                                                                                                         @PathVariable
                                                                                                         java.lang.Long storeID)
                                                                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Post a new book
        Parameters:
        book - The book to be posted
        storeID - The ID of the store to which the book is being posted
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity> If the specified bookstore is not the one on this server, a redirect to the proper server is returned
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the specified store does not exist in this network

@PostMapping("/bookstores/book")

        CollectionModel>

      • one

        @RateLimiter(name="DDoS-stopper")
@GetMapping("/bookstores/{storeID}/books/{bookId}")
protected org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<Book>> one​(@PathVariable
                                                                                                     java.lang.Long bookId,
                                                                                                     @PathVariable
                                                                                                     java.lang.Long storeID,
                                                                                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                                                                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Get one book from the specified boosktore
        Parameters:
        bookId - The book to return
        storeID - The store which contains the book
        request - The request from the client, contains useful information like the RequestID
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity> If the specified bookstore is not the one on this server, a redirect to the proper server is returned
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the bookstore can't be found

      • all

        @RateLimiter(name="DDoS-stopper")
@GetMapping("/bookstores/{storeID}/books")
protected org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.hateoas.CollectionModel<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<Book>>> all​(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.Long storeID,
                                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                                                                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> id,
                                                                                                                                                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                                                                                                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        storeID - The bookstore to get the books from
        id - A list of books to get If not provided, will assume that all books contained in the specified store are being requested
        request - The request from the client, contains useful information like the RequestID
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity>> If the specified bookstore is not the one on this server, a redirect to the proper server is returned
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the bookstore can't be found

      • updateBook

        @RateLimiter(name="DDoS-stopper")
@PutMapping("/bookstores/{storeID}/books/{id}")
protected org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<Book>> updateBook​(@RequestBody
                                                                                                            Book newBook,

                                                                                                     throws java.lang.Exception

        newBook - The updated book
        id - ID of the book being updated
        storeID - Bookstore which contains the book to be updated
        request - The request from the client, contains useful information like the RequestID
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity> If the specified bookstore is not the one on this server, a redirect to the proper server is returned
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the bookstore can't be found

      • deleteBook

        @RateLimiter(name="DDoS-stopper")
@DeleteMapping("/bookstores/{storeID}/books/{id}")
protected org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<Book>> deleteBook​(@PathVariable
                                                                                                            java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                            @PathVariable
                                                                                                            java.lang.Long storeID,
                                                                                                            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                                                                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the book being deleted
        storeID - Bookstore which contains the intended book
        request - The request from the client, contains useful information like the RequestID
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity> If the specified bookstore is not the one on this server, a redirect to the proper server is returned
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the bookstore can't be found
